byline.original: By GUIDO ENDERIS Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: reaction in Germany to Chamberlain s
snippet: BERLIN, July 1--Britain's chances in a fight to the finish with Germany continue to preoccupy German editorial writers, who say that the problems now have shifted from the realm of theoretical discussion to that of practical politics....

headline.main: REICH SEES ALARM IN BRITAIN GROWING; Chamberlain's Speech Termed Proof of Mounting Fear of a German Invasion PEACE TALK IS RIDICULED Nazis Contend That They Are in Position to Employ Any Method of Warfare

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, July 1--Britain's chances in a fight to the finish with Germany continue to preoccupy German editorial writers, who say that the problems now have shifted from the realm of theoretical discussion to that of practical politics.
